name: Snow Bot
description: SnowBot - Unlock access to cutting-edge crypto Telegram bots and token trading tools, complete with a profit-sharing feature for an enriched trading experience! What is SnowBot? Introducing SnowBot, the innovative Telegram trading bot exclusively for the Avalanche Network. SnowBot is engineered to empower traders on the Avalanche platform, offering a unique blend of convenience, speed, and intelligence directly through your Telegram account. SnowBot offers a revenue share program, which allows token holders to earn 80% of the fees paid to the bot. SnowBot wallet: The cornerstone bot, essential for operating other bots. (No revenue generation) SnowBot sniper: A mere 0.8% fee from every buy and sell trade. SnowBot multisniper: Charge of 0.8% fee from each wallet. SnowBot scanner: Generates revenue through advertising. SnowBot bridge: 0.8% transaction fee How to earn ? Just hold at least 10 $SBOT token in the wallet. All eligible wallet will be qualified. Snapshot will be taken randomly during the week. Profits will be distributed towards users proportionally every Sunday. Any users who sell after the snapshot is taken won't be getting any revenue share. How do I claim my reward? All profits will be distributed weekly in prize of AVAX. Users get airdropped AVAX to its wallet.
